column4: guys, i need help. after installing feisty, there is no entry for xp on one of me four sata disks...
how do i create grub entry for that
edit /boot/grub/menu.lst .. there's a windows example commented out in there.
what will my root for xp be? /dev/sda1
/dev/sda1 might also work... it's basically the same, hd0,0 is grub syntax.. /dev/sda1 is the way linux sees it.
thanks, i get back on you... !
try to replace " root            root /dev/sda1 so" with " root            /dev/sda1"
